title: Benchmarking Self-Supervised Learning for Single-Cell Data
details: P Toma, O Ovcharenko, I Daunhawer, J Vogt… - bioRxiv, 2024
abstract: Self-supervised learning (SSL) has emerged as a powerful approach for learning biologically meaningful representations of single-cell data. To establish best practices in this domain, we present a comprehensive benchmark evaluating eight …

title: Activity Cliff-Informed Contrastive Learning for Molecular Property Prediction
details: W SHEN, C Cui, X Su, Z Zhang, A Velez-Arce, J Wang… - 2024
abstract: Modeling molecular activity and quantitative structure-activity relationships of chemical compounds is critical in drug design. Graph neural networks, which utilize molecular structures as frames, have shown success in assessing the biological …
